body:
Building still fails at Step 5 : `RUN go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/cover github.com/tools/godep`: 
core@master ~/kubernetes/build $ ./make-build-image.sh
You don't have a local copy of the golang docker image. This image is 450MB.

# cd .; hg clone -U https://code.google.com/p/go.tools /go/src/golang.org/x/tools

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: building fails at Step 5
